item.title: Past Events
item.description: Second Boston Symmetry Day: November 3, 2023 at MIT Schedule: 9:00-9:30. Breakfast + Registration 9:30-9:40. Opening Remarks 9:40-10:20. Talk 1 by Gabriele Corso, Bowen Jing, and Hannes Stark (MIT) “Equivariant Generative Processes for Molecular Docking” [Slides] 10:20-10:25. Sponsor presentation for Boston Dynamics AI Institute
